entry.title: Screen and Digitizer For iPhone XS
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: LCD
Price: 79.99 - 134.99 (2 variants)

Select

The Select screens for iPhone XS are LCD Screens. They are offered if you operate in a price-competitive market where value is most important. The screens also go through strict quality assurance testing.

  • High Brightness Backlight
  • Aligned Front Camera Ring
  • Foam Connector Pads
  • Lifetime Warranty

Certified (Recommended)

The Certified screens for iPhone XS OLED are built with noticeably higher brightness and contrast than others. Certified screens are custom built to match or exceed our strict specification standards in terms of brightness and color reproduction.

  • Color calibrated Soft OLED & Digitizer
  • High Brightness Backlight
  • Aligned Front Camera Ring
  • Foam Connector Pads
  • Proximity Sensor Bracket

Lifetime Warranty

The Replacement iPhone XS LCD Screens and Digitizers come with lifetime warranty, as the other replacement parts for iPhone.

Part Type Screens and Digitizer
Compatible Model iPhone XS (5.8")
Model Number A1920
Warranty Lifetime Warranty

entry.title: iPhone XS Wireless Charging Coil & Antenna
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Antenna
Price: 18.99

Replace a damaged or malfunctioning internal inductive charging coil adhered to the rear case in an iPhone XS and fix problems with wireless charging. This coil is soldered to the flex cable for the Audio Control Cable Assembly. Replacing this component requires microsoldering.
